name: Joshua Tree Rock Climbs 3rd Edition
description: World-renowned for its bold trad climbing, California's Joshua Tree National Park has a monumental volume of rock and a variety of easy and moderate routes. The extraterrestrial ambiance of its landscape sets it apart from all other climbing areas. This guide covers the entire park, describing 3000 of the finest climbs, including several of the better bouldering circuits, as well as some of the park's fantastic hikes.
